description.value:
This fruit is slowly, constantly changing shape, transforming from one fruit into another, but always appearing at the peak of ripeness.

When you consume the fruit, it attempts to counteract all curses, diseases, and poisons affecting you, and you immediately regain [[/r 8d8+30[healing]]]{8d8+30 Hit Points}. The fruit has a counteract rank of 9 and a [[/r 1d20+30]] modifier for the rolls against each condition.

The fruit's seed remains after consumption and can be planted later, becoming a seed-shaped @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Feather Token (Tree)] that sprouts a tree bearing many kinds of mundane fruit.
